backend/main.mo: Motoko actor that exposes a public query function getBgRemoveApiKey() returning a hardcoded Remove.bg API key.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two completed features: removing user API key input from UI and updating hooks to fetch shared API key from backend.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files describing a 5-step passport photo workflow with upload, crop, background removal, color selection, and download capabilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes using a warm neutral color palette for a professional photography studio aesthetic.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Passport Photo Size Maker application with root div and module script reference.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component managing the 5-step workflow state (upload, crop, background removal, color selection, download) with QueryClient provider and step navigation logic.
frontend/src/components/BackgroundColorS: Component for selecting and applying background colors (white, black, blue) to processed images with real-time preview, checkerboard transparency pattern, and loading states.
frontend/src/components/BackgroundRemove: Component that uses useBackgroundRemoval hook to automatically fetch API key from backend and process images via Remove.bg API with professional loading UI, error handling, and skip option.
frontend/src/components/CropEditor.tsx: Interactive image cropping component with zoom and drag controls that allows users to manually crop images to a 3.5:4.5 aspect ratio for passport photos, rendering the image and crop overlay on a canvas.
frontend/src/components/DownloadControls: Final step component that displays the processed passport photo with specifications and provides download buttons for JPG and PNG formats at 300 DPI (413Ã—531 pixels), optionally applying background color before download.
frontend/src/components/ImageUploader.ts: File upload component supporting drag-and-drop and file browsing for JPG, PNG, and WEBP images up to 10MB, converting selected files to data URLs for processing.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main application layout wrapper providing header with branding, footer with social links and caffeine.ai attribution, and a container for page content.
Progress indicator component displaying five workflow steps (upload, crop, background, color, download) with visual states for completed, current, and upcoming steps, allowing navigation to completed steps.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages an ICP actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
Hook that integrates with Remove.bg API to remove image backgrounds, managing processing state, error handling, and API key retrieval from backend queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useCropState.ts: Custom React hook managing crop state (x, y, zoom) with update and reset functions for image cropping interface.
frontend/src/hooks/useImageUpload.ts: Custom React hook handling image file upload with validation (JPG/PNG/WEBP, max 10MB), FileReader conversion to data URL, and error state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity authentication provider and hook for ICP integration, managing login/logout flow, identity persistence, and authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hook to fetch Remove.bg API key from backend actor with infinite cache stale time.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color palette featuring warm neutral tones and photography studio aesthetic for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function combining clsx and tailwind-merge for conditional CSS class name composition.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point wrapping App with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider for React Query and ICP authentication.
frontend/src/utils/applyBackground.ts: Canvas utility applying solid background color to transparent PNG images, scaling to passport photo dimensions (413x531px) while maintaining aspect ratio.
frontend/src/utils/cropImage.ts: Canvas-based image cropping utility that extracts specified crop area and scales output to passport photo dimensions (413x531px at 300 DPI).
frontend/src/utils/downloadImage.ts: Utility function converting image to JPG or PNG blob at passport photo dimensions and triggering browser download with proper filename.
frontend/src/utils/imageToBlob.ts: Converts data URLs, blob URLs, or regular URLs to Blob objects for FormData submission to Remove.bg API.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme with custom OKLCH colors, Inter font family, container settings, and animation keyframes for accordion components.
project_state.json: Project metadata documenting passport photo maker app (3.5x4.5cm at 300 DPI) with manual cropping, Remove.bg API integration, background color options, and multi-format download features.
